title: Gene
description: Schema for submitting a gene (adapted from ENCODE).

geneid.title: NCBI Entrez GeneID
geneid.description: NCBI Entrez GeneID of official nomenclature approved gene.
geneid.comment: An gene (object) needs to have an Entrez GeneID and needs to be approved by (i.e. have an ID and gene symbol from) offical nomenclature such as HGNC, MGI, FlyBase, WormBase.

official_symbol.title: Gene symbol
official_symbol.description: Gene symbol approved by the official nomenclature.

preferred_symbol.title: Common symbol
preferred_symbol.description: Preferred gene symbol commonly used by the community.

fullname.title: Gene name
fullname.description: The full gene name preferably approved by the official nomenclature.

synonyms.title: Synonyms
synonyms.description: Alternative symbols that have been used to refer to the gene.
synonyms.comment: The list of synonyms is maintained using information from NCBI Entrez. Synonyms not included in NCBI gene_info can be added but are not actively maintained.

items.title: Synonym
items.description: An alternative symbol/name referring to the gene.

genomic_location.title: Genomic Location
genomic_location.description: Location of the gene on it's genome

url.title: NCBI link
url.description: Link to the gene record in NCBI
